title: "Blue Hexagon Joins AWS ISV Accelerate Program"
excerpt: "Blue Hexagon, a leading agentless cloud-native AI platform, announced that it is joining the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Independent Software Vendor (ISV) Accelerate Program. The AWS ISV Accelerate Program is a co-sell program for AWS Partners who provide software solutions that run on or integrate with AWS."
